channel.title: Very wierd problem, help please
channel.description:
Well we have a weird problem. When I kill someone, or someone kills me, the server crashes. When I restart, people try to login and it says Your account is already logged in. So I have to keep restarting the server until people can login. Some people can't login anymore, it says error connecting to server, but we're positive the info is correct.
If you know whats wrong please leave your MSN Yahoo or Skype. Thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2008, 11:28:18 am[/size][hr]FFS. It auto logged me out since I was afk, now it says error connecting to server, but the server still works because on the cmd I see everyone using yell and commands. No one has disconnected. This is what I'm trying to fix.
I can only log back in if I restart the server a few times, that can be a drag because people tend to leave if they keep dcing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2008, 05:09:18 pm[/size][hr]Attempt to bump.

item.title: Very wierd problem, help please
item.dc:creator: @runescapeprivate runescapeprivate
item.description:
@runescapeprivate wrote:

Well we have a weird problem.
When I kill someone, or someone kills me, the server crashes. When I restart, people try to login and it says Your account is already logged in.
So I have to keep restarting the server until people can login.
Some people can’t login anymore, it says error connecting to server, but we’re positive the info is correct.

If you know whats wrong please leave your MSN Yahoo or Skype.
Thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2008, 11:28:18 am[/size][hr]FFS.
It auto logged me out since I was afk, now it says error connecting to server, but the server still works because on the cmd I see everyone using yell and commands. No one has disconnected. This is what I’m trying to fix.

I can only log back in if I restart the server a few times, that can be a drag because people tend to leave if they keep dcing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2008, 05:09:18 pm[/size][hr]Attempt to bump.
